title: Benog Tibba Trek
subtitle: Easy to Moderate
description: Benog Tibba, one of the coolest weekend treks from Delhi, transverses through steep mountains and forests.

title: Roopkund Trek
subtitle: Moderate to Difficult
description: The 8-day trek takes you through deep virgin forests, whispering brooks, breath-taking campsites and miles of greenery.

title: Chakrata Trek
subtitle: Moderate
description: A quiet and picturesque hill station that offers amazing trekking around Delhi, located in the Garhwal region of Uttarakhand.
